channel.title: Log of kill rates
channel.description:
Key: (#Average Kills per night (only unlimited one's)) + (Temp kills ability uses)
Unseen: MM: 1 (converting is 2) Assassin: 1 + 2 + 1 (3 kills in a single night maximum) Sell Sword: +1 Enforcer: +1 -1 (0) Unseen Min KPN : 2 + 2 + 1 (max of 5 in one night) Unseen Max KPN: 2 + 2 + 1 + 1 (max of 6 in one night) Cult: CL: 1.5 - 0.25(sacrifice happends 1 every 4 days if you do it right) (1.25) Ritualist: + 2*0.5(1) Cult min KPN: 1.5 - 0.25 (average of 1.25) Cult max KPN: 1.5 - 0.25 + 3 (3 ritualist's) (average of 2.25 in a night. Max of almost everyone)
Both NK have a KPR is 1
Total Expected Deaths:
Both assume evil/neut king, 1 NK, 1 other neutral and that all kills succeed
BD - Non BD
Unseen - No poison/2 for 1
D1: 11 - 5 D2: 9 - 6 D3: 7 - 6 D4: 5 - 6 D5: 3 - 6 D6: 1 - 6
Cult
D1: 11 - 5 D2: 9 - 6 D3: 7 - 6 D4: 5 - 7 D5: 3 - 7 D6: 1- 7
Unseen with poison, 2 for 1 and sellsword kill D1: 11 - 5 D2: 8 - 6 D3: 5 - 6 D4: 2 - 6 D5: 0 - 6
Cult with Ritualist. Assumes 1 extra kill every other attack D1: 11 - 5 D2: 9 - 6 D3: 6 - 6 D4: 4 - 7 D5: 2 - 7 D6: 0 - 7

item.title: Log of kill rates
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Key: (#Average Kills per night (only unlimited one’s)) + (Temp kills ability uses)

Unseen: MM: 1 (converting is 2) Assassin: 1 + 2 + 1 (3 kills in a single night maximum) Sell Sword: +1 Enforcer: +1 -1 (0)
Unseen Min KPN : 2 + 2 + 1 (max of 5 in one night)
Unseen Max KPN: 2 + 2 + 1 + 1 (max of 6 in one night)
Cult: CL: 1.5 - 0.25(sacrifice happends 1 every 4 days if you do it right) (1.25) Ritualist: + 2*0.5(1)
Cult min KPN: 1.5 - 0.25 (average of 1.25)
Cult max KPN: 1.5 - 0.25 + 3 (3 ritualist’s) (average of 2.25 in a night. Max of almost everyone)

Both NK have a KPR is 1

Total Expected Deaths:

Both assume evil/neut king, 1 NK, 1 other neutral and that all kills succeed

BD - Non BD

Unseen - No poison/2 for 1

D1: 11 - 5
D2: 9 - 6
D3: 7 - 6
D4: 5 - 6
D5: 3 - 6
D6: 1 - 6

Cult

D1: 11 - 5
D2: 9 - 6
D3: 7 - 6
D4: 5 - 7
D5: 3 - 7
D6: 1- 7

Unseen with poison, 2 for 1 and sellsword kill
D1: 11 - 5
D2: 8 - 6
D3: 5 - 6
D4: 2 - 6
D5: 0 - 6

Cult with Ritualist. Assumes 1 extra kill every other attack
D1: 11 - 5
D2: 9 - 6
D3: 6 - 6
D4: 4 - 7
D5: 2 - 7
